trans-unit.source: A standard discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: En standard endepunktoppdagelse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryVersion%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMode.Managed>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryVersion%2A>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMode.Managed>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMode.Managed> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified binding and endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klassen med den angitte adressen bindings- og sluttpunkt.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryVersion%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.ServiceDiscoveryMode>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryVersion%2A>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.ServiceDiscoveryMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.ServiceDiscoveryMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint.DiscoveryVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The binding.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktsadressen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified discovery version and mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klassen med den angitte discovery versjonen og modus.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing one of the versions of the WS-Discovery protocols.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi som representerer en av versjonene av WS Discovery-protokoller.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing one of the modes used to send discovery messages.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi som representerer en av modiene som brukes til å sende meldinger oppdaging.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified discovery version, mode, binding, and endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klassen med angitte discovery versjon, modus, binding og endpoint adressen.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing one of the versions of the WS-Discovery protocols.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi som representerer en av versjonene av WS Discovery-protokoller.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing one of the modes used to send discovery messages.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi som representerer en av modiene som brukes til å sende meldinger oppdaging.

trans-unit.source: The binding elements that specify the protocols, transports, and message encoders used for communication between clients and services.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen elementer som angir protokoller, transport og melding kodere brukes til kommunikasjon mellom klienter og tjenester.

trans-unit.source: The unique address of the discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Unik adresse for endepunktoppdagelse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the DiscoveryMode for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter DiscoveryMode for sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Discovery can be accomplished in two different modes: Ad-Hoc or Managed.
trans-unit.target: Discovery kan oppnås i to forskjellige måter: Ad Hoc- eller behandlet.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][WCF Discovery Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Oversikt over WCF-oppdaging](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: One of the DiscoveryMode enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av DiscoveryMode opplisting verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> for sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> within which all of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ProbeMatches" name="ProbeMatches" href=""></xref> for a service that respond to a probe operation are sent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt <xref:System.TimeSpan>i som alle de <xref uid="langword_csharp_ProbeMatches" name="ProbeMatches" href=""> </xref> for en tjeneste som svar på en probe operasjonen sendes.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This value is a <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies a time span in which all `ProbeMatches` for a service that respond to a single probe operation are sent.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er en <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir et tidsrom i som alle `ProbeMatches` for en tjeneste som svarer til en enkelt probe operasjonen sendes.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: If all `ProbeMatches` are sent at the same time, a network storm may result.
trans-unit.target: Hvis alle `ProbeMatches` sendes samtidig, kan det føre til et nettverk storm.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this from occurring, `ProbeMatches` are sent with a random delay between each ProbeMatch.
trans-unit.target: Å hindre at dette skjer, `ProbeMatches` sendes med en tilfeldig forsinkelse mellom hvert ProbeMatch.

trans-unit.source: The random delay is in the range of 0 to MaxResponseDelay.
trans-unit.target: Tilfeldig forsinkelsen er i området 0 til MaxResponseDelay.

trans-unit.source: If MaxResponseDelay is set to 0, then the `ProbeMatches` messages are sent in a tight loop without any delay.
trans-unit.target: Hvis MaxResponseDelay er satt til 0, og deretter den `ProbeMatches` meldinger sendt i en tett sløyfe uten forsinkelser.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `ProbeMatches` messages are sent with some random delay such that the total time taken to send all `ProbeMatches` messages does not exceed the MaxResponseDelay.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den `ProbeMatches` -meldinger sendes med noen tilfeldig forsinkelse slik som den totale tiden til å sende alle `ProbeMatches` meldinger ikke overskride MaxResponseDelay.

trans-unit.source: This value is only relevant for services, it is not used by clients.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien gjelder bare for tjenester, den brukes ikke av klienter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> instance that contains the maximum time span within which all of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ProbeMatches" name="ProbeMatches" href=""></xref> for a service that respond to a probe operation are sent.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>forekomsten som inneholder maksimalt tidsrommet i som alle de <xref uid="langword_csharp_ProbeMatches" name="ProbeMatches" href=""> </xref> for en tjeneste som svar på en probe operasjonen sendes.</xref:System.TimeSpan>
